title: The Mascot 'La Bussi' Is Promoting Public Transportation, so Get Your Mind out of the Gutter
description: A week ago, a new bus mascot happily presented itself to the world in Sabadell, a city outside of Barcelona in Spain. For some, it was big, unique, and colorful, with a certain je ne sais quoi.
